video_prompt: Space fleet maneuver in orbit over an intensely luminous, urbanized celestial body. Ships of varying sizes dynamically position, with thrusters glowing. Atmospheric phenomena shift and clouds swirl around the bright horizon.
image_prompt: Vast space fleet orbiting an illuminated, heavily urbanized celestial body with a brightly lit horizon and dynamic cloud formations. Foreground features a detailed large capital ship and numerous sleek medium ships with glowing thrusters. Dark blue space contrasts with the warm glow of the planet's city lights. Dramatic, grand scale.
refined_video_prompt: A space fleet actively maneuvers, dynamically repositioning ships in formation. Thrusters flare and dim as vessels adjust. Below, atmospheric phenomena continuously shift and evolve, with clouds swirling and undulating. Urban lights subtly flicker and shimmer across the celestial body's luminous horizon.
